content: विकच {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [विकच्-अच्] {@--1@} Blown, expanded, opened (as a lotus-flower &c.); विकचकिंशुकसंहतिरुच्चकैः <ls>Śi. 6. 21</ls>; <ls>R. 9. 37.</ls> {@--2@} Spread about, scattered over; <ls>Bv. 1. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Destitute of hair. {@--4@} Manifested, distinctly apparent; <ls>U. 5. 26</ls>; विकचनक्षत्रकुमुदैः <ls>Mu. 3. 7.</ls> --चः {@--1@} A Buddhist mendicant. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Ketu. {@--3@} A flag, banner.
